pricing_notes: Pricing is based on the number of cleaners and office managers, with specific features and limits per tier.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Perfect for new cleaning businesses just getting started.
features: Easy-to-use scheduling with calendar, dispatch, map views and more
Limited automated SMS & Emails communications templates to cleaners and customers
Cleaner SOS alert on mobile apps
Online payments with Stripe and Square and invoicing

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Ideal for established businesses ready to scale.
features: Mobile app with cleaner GPS tracking
High-converting booking forms for your website (with ZenMaid branding)
More automated SMS & Emails communications templates to cleaners and customers
Spotfinder for easy scheduling of new recurring customers

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Our most comprehensive solution with full features and priority support.
features: Service ratings to collect feedback from your customers
All automated SMS & Emails communication templates to cleaners and customers
High-converting booking forms with your own branding

additional_fees.fee_description: SMS charges are not included in the subscription price.

original_app_metadata.name: ZenMaid
original_app_metadata.description: ZenMaid is a simple scheduling software for maid services - including automated communication, GPS clock times, payroll, reporting and much more.
